Package org.divxdede.text.formatter

Interface Summary
PatternFormatter.ArgumentNameSpace An arguments namespace allow to define custom conversion's identifiers instead of using defaults.
PatternFormatter.AttributeArgumentNameSpace AttributeArgumentNameSpace is a namespace binding conversion's identifier to a particular property of the argument.
PatternFormatter.DetailedArgumentNameSpace This extended implementation of ArgumentNameSpace allow to control more informations on arguments like: Flags that can modify the output format Width that give the minium number of characters Precision that restrict the number of characters (depend of the conversion)
PatternFormatter.IndexableArgumentNameSpace IndexableArgumentNameSpace is a namespace that can define which argument must be used for formatting a specified conversion's identifier.
 

Class Summary
PatternFormatter PatternFormatter is a printf-style string formatting implementation like Formatter.
PatternFormatter.ArgumentDetails Details how an argument must be formatted with more informations Flags that can modify the output format Width that give the minium number of characters Precision that restrict the number of characters (depend of the conversion)
PatternFormatter.CompositeArgumentNameSpace This namespace implementation allow to compose a namespace from differents one.
PatternFormatter.DefaultArgumentNameSpace Default implementation of ArgumentNameSpace accepting standard symbols for all supported conversions.
PatternFormatter.Flags Represent flags set usable for an ArgumentDetails This class is compatible with the java.util.Formatter$Flags class in bit values and can be used with java.util.Formattable objects Flags can't be instanciate directly.
PatternFormatter.Pattern Compiled pattern form.
SimpleFormatter A simple string formatter giving an easy, readable and efficient way to concatenates strings.
 

Enum Summary
PatternFormatter.Conversion Describe all conversion types managed by this formatter
PatternFormatter.DateTimeConversion Describe all date-time conversion's suffix modifiers
